Sentencas: For a sustainable hydrogen economy, large-scale transportation and storage of hydrogen becomes increasingly important.
Titulo: Concept for Temperature-Cascade Hydrogen Release from Organic Liquid Carriers Coupled with SOFC Power Generation

Sentencas: Typically, hydrogen is compressed or liquified, but both processes are energy intensive.
Titulo: Concept for Temperature-Cascade Hydrogen Release from Organic Liquid Carriers Coupled with SOFC Power Generation

Sentencas: Liquid organic hydrogen carriers (LOHCs) present a potential solution for mitigating these challenges while making use of the existing fossil fuel transportation infrastructure.
Titulo: Concept for Temperature-Cascade Hydrogen Release from Organic Liquid Carriers Coupled with SOFC Power Generation

Sentencas: Here, we present a process intensification strategy for improved LOHC dehydrogenation and an example of clean power generation using solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Concept for Temperature-Cascade Hydrogen Release from Organic Liquid Carriers Coupled with SOFC Power Generation

Sentencas: Four LOHC candidates-ammonia, biphenyl-diphenylmethane eutectic mixture, N-phenylcarbazole, and N-ethylcarbazole-have been compared as stand-alone and integrated systems using comprehensive process simulation.
Titulo: Concept for Temperature-Cascade Hydrogen Release from Organic Liquid Carriers Coupled with SOFC Power Generation

Sentencas: Temperature cascade dehydrogenation was shown to increase the energy generated per unit mass (kWh/kg LOHC) by 1.3-2 times in an integrated system compared to stand-alone LOHC systems, thus providing a possibility for a positive impact an a LOHC-based hydrogen supply chain.
Titulo: Concept for Temperature-Cascade Hydrogen Release from Organic Liquid Carriers Coupled with SOFC Power Generation
